attributes.action: Compulsory labelling of religious slaughter meat products
attributes.additional_details: That the government makes it compulsory for any wholesale or retail supplier of a meat derived product to clearly display labelling that a consumer can easily read and understand, that said produce was produced by means of religious and or ritual slaughter. This is designed to give a consumer a clear understanding of the product he or she is considering to purchase so that an informed choice can be made.
